description.elevator: Sterling Consulting provides strategic advisory services for mid-market companies navigating digital transformation.
description.detailed:
Sterling Consulting Group is a management consulting firm specializing in digital transformation strategy for mid-market businesses. We help companies develop and execute technology strategies that align with business objectives, with particular expertise in retail, manufacturing, and financial services sectors.

Our approach combines strategic planning, technology assessment, and change management to ensure successful transformations. We work closely with C-suite executives and their teams to navigate the complexities of modernizing legacy systems while maintaining business continuity.

primary.name: Digital Transformation Strategy
primary.description: Comprehensive planning for technology modernization initiatives

primary.name: Technology Assessment
primary.description: Evaluation of current systems and recommendations for improvement

primary.name: Change Management
primary.description: Organizational change programs to support technology adoption

offerings.targetCustomers: Mid-market companies ($50M-$500M revenue) in retail, manufacturing, and financial services undergoing digital transformation
